sample_document.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/js-yaml/examples/sample_document.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-19 03:18:33 +0200

'use strict';

var fs = require('fs'); var path = require('path'); var util = require('util'); var yaml = require('../lib/js-yaml');

try {

var filename = path.join(__dirname, 'sample_document.yml'),
    contents = fs.readFileSync(filename, 'utf8'),
    data     = yaml.load(contents);

console.log(util.inspect(data, false, 10, true));

} catch (err) {

console.log(err.stack || String(err));

}
